title: The Descendants of Judah
summary: The genealogy of Judah is detailed, showing the line from Israel’s son Judah down to King David. This chapter establishes the royal lineage through which the Messiah would come.

faq.question: Why is Judah’s genealogy significant?
faq.answer: Because it leads to King David and ultimately to Jesus, the promised Messiah.

faq.question: What is unique about this chapter?
faq.answer: It begins focusing on the tribe of Judah, the central tribe in Israel’s history.
